overview_of_class: Communication is at the very core of what teachers do. Teachers must communicate with students, and foster an environment in which students can communicate with each other. This course is designed to address these issues. Public speaking, interpersonal communication, and classroom management issues will be discussed, with emphasis on the special context of the school environment. The class requires several small presentations and will satisfy the public speaking deficiency for licensure.
name: Special Topics in Teacher Education
title: SESP TEACH_ED 351-0-20 Special Topics in Teacher Education
topic: Speech and Communication in the School Environment
enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Pre-Registration - Reserved for SESP Students.
Add Consent: Department Consent Required
